sample_docs: Our Valued Partners - Trusted by Global Leaders in Security Banks, fintechs, KYC's, and governments rely on Oz Forensics' face liveness detection and biometric software to safeguard identities and optimize processes. Our Valued Partners - Trusted by Global Leaders in Security Banks, fintechs, KYC's, and governments rely on Oz Forensics' face liveness detection and biometric software to safeguard identities and optimize processes. Delivering Trusted Biometric Security Solutions Delivering Trusted Biometric Security Solutions Oz Liveness, a cutting-edge face liveness detection solution within our facial recognition software, protects against biometric attacks. Tested and approved by iBeta (ISO 30107-3 Levels 1 & 2), our certified algorithms verify the presence of a living person and effectively withstand spoofing attacks, including deepfakes and 3D manipulations. Oz Liveness, a cutting-edge face liveness detection solution within our facial recognition software, protects against biometric attacks. Tested and approved by iBeta (ISO 30107-3 Levels 1 & 2), our certified algorithms verify the presence of a living person and effectively withstand spoofing attacks, including deepfakes and 3D manipulations. Delivering Trusted Biometric Security Solutions Oz Liveness, a cutting-edge face liveness detection solution within our facial recognition software, protects against biometric attacks. Tested and approved by iBeta (ISO 30107-3 Levels 1 & 2), our certified algorithms verify the presence of a living person and effectively withstand spoofing attacks, including deepfakes and 3D manipulations. Seamless liveness check on web, iOS, or Android. We support on-premise, SaaS, and cloud marketplace integrations to fit your needs. Combines advanced encryption, tamper resistance, and real-time environment analysis powered by machine learning to ensure resilience against injection and presentation attacks. Seamless liveness check on web, iOS, or Android. We support on-premise, SaaS, and cloud marketplace integrations to fit your needs. Combines advanced encryption, tamper resistance, and real-time environment analysis powered by machine learning to ensure resilience against injection and presentation attacks. Built-in KYC capabilities everywhere Perform identity verification through selfie, document, and watchlist checks seamlessly in the same flow. Supports on-premise, SaaS, and cloud marketplace deployments to fit your infrastructure. Combines advanced encryption, tamper resistance, and real-time environment analysis powered by machine learning to ensure resilience against injection and presentation attacks. Oz Biometry transforms identity verification with advanced facial recognition technology, offering both 1:1 face biometric verification and 1:N face identification using the best shot from a video or selfie compared to an ID photo or a database record. Powered by machine learning algorithms trained in our proprietary framework and built on state-of-the-art technology, our solution delivers unmatched security. Oz Biometry transforms identity verification with advanced facial recognition technology, offering both 1:1 face biometric verification and 1:N face identification using the best shot from a video or selfie compared to an ID photo or a database record. Powered by machine learning algorithms trained in our proprietary framework and built on state-of-the-art technology, our solution delivers unmatched security. Oz Biometry transforms identity verification with advanced facial recognition technology, offering both 1:1 face biometric verification and 1:N face identification using the best shot from a video or selfie compared to an ID photo or a database record. Powered by machine learning algorithms trained in our proprietary framework and built on state-of-the-art technology, our solution delivers unmatched security. First Attempt Conversion Rate Authentications processed every day in 30 countries around the world Conversion rate among users 60+ better results than our top competitor False Acceptance Rate (FAR)* *Zero false acceptance rate (FAR) observed in internal testing under controlled conditions. First Attempt Conversion Rate Certified Fraud Prevention by Global Standards Certified Fraud Prevention by Global Standards Certified Fraud Prevention by Global Standards Setting the Standard in Biometric Security Our technology combines multilayered security with seamless integration and ultra-fast performance. It's designed to ensure reliability, scalability, and protection across every user interaction. Setting the Standard in Biometric Security Our technology combines multilayered security with seamless integration and ultra-fast performance. It's designed to ensure reliability, scalability, and protection across every user interaction. With machine learning to ensure resilience against injection and presentation attacks. The technology combines advanced encryption, tamper resistance, and real-time analysis of the environment. Supports SaaS, on-premise, and cloud environments like AWS Marketplace, adapting to your infrastructure. Fast integration, low cost, minimal maintenance. Full data control, more maintenance. Quick deployment, low maintenance, Delivers accurate analysis, easy integration, and a seamless user journey from capture to verification, optimized for speed, simplicity, and performance in low bandwidth or mobile conditions. Seamless Identity Verification trusted by Industry Leaders We help banks, fintechs, and governments deliver secure, scalable biometric solutions for identity verification and fraud prevention. Seamless Identity Verification trusted by Industry Leaders We help banks, fintechs, and governments deliver secure, scalable biometric solutions for identity verification and fraud prevention. "The partnership with Oz has undoubtedly strengthened our solution and improved reliability. For a major player like Unico, obtaining a trustworthy, agile, and secure solution is essential, and Oz proved to be the right choice for us." Diego Poblete, Head of Product at Unico Unico Global identity network Read More "Oz Liveness helped us to safeguard our identification and verification processes. The Oz Liveness integration was completed within only a few working hours. After we started to operate with Oz Liveness, the period for identity checks shortened to 4 seconds, and we also managed to narrow down the biometric fraud attempts to zero. Oz Liveness became a trust factor for our clients: now, they are sure that their financial operations are safe." — Davron Adylkhodjaev, CIO/CTO of TBC Uzbekistan. Davron Adylkhodjaev CIO/CTO of TBC Uzbekistan Read More "It's a great feeling when your client is satisfied with the services provided. And after the integration, our client was happy and satisfied with the services provided by Oz Forensics." Karen Davtyan - Director of NOVASYSTEM LLC Karen Davtyan Director of NOVASYSTEM LLC.
